answers.answer: Is this diabetes 1 or 2 theres a section on earth clinic for diabetes if you think you would like a more natural approach to it, you may find an answer to there, or you could try cayenne as this helpe to open your veins down below, and I dont think this will effect your drugs, but please check that out by reading the cayenne web site, lots to read about cayenne, there is the 5G's but again read about its effects with high blood pressure, its ginko, ginger, green tea, ginseng and garlic, garlic on its own may help as well, I take this chopped up fine in olive oil with dried parsley in it this last bit helps to take away the breath smell, take befroe a meal also helps, take 3 small spoonfalls with some water to wash it down, twice daily.You just the old morning wood could be good to wake the wife up with, put a smile on her face before breakfast.Are yes google the 5 G's and look on pegym, but I'm not to sure with the high blood pressure and the ginger, please read about that and check it, I know that you should not take it with low dose asprin.Good luck

question: I am a 61 year old male.  I have been on various anti-depressants since my late 30's (Major Dysthymic Depression, PTSD).  Since 1992 I have had off and on again problems maintaining an erection and finally around 2000 I pretty much lost interest in sex all together.  Finally in 2005 I went to an Endocrinologist and she diagnosed me as having way low testosterone.  She put me on patches and later Androgel pumps and finally little packets that I squeeze on.  The "mood" returned with a vengeance, but unfortunately my erection hasn't.  I have noticed that if I am lying in bed in the middle of the night, I can occasionally get a hard erection but most of the time it is way to soft to do anything.  I have had Rx for Viagra and the various clones, and also just got a penis pump a couple of months ago.  Neither works at all.I have high blood pressure (125/60 -140/70 with an occasional spike to 150/65), and am on Metformin for diabetes (ranges anywhere from 70 to 130 average through out the day).  I have run out of ideas on what to do and my wife is getting aggravated, although luckily with her menopause, her libido has been mostly low so that helps.Any suggestions?  If nothing else how do I get the damn pump to work?
title: ED Nothing helps
